files.name: .prettierrc.js
.travis.yml
files.content:
sudo: true
branches:
  only:
    - master
language: node_js
node_js:
  - "10"
install:
  - npm install
before_script:
  - git clone "https://godbmw:$GITHUB_TOKEN@github.com/dongyuanxin/notes.git" notes
script:
  - npm run check
  - ./deploy.sh

files.name: deploy.sh
files.content:
#!/usr/bin/env sh

# throw error
set -e

if [[ -z "$CODING_TOKEN"  || -z "$GITHUB_TOKEN" ]]; then
  exit 0
fi

# build static
npm run build
cd .vuepress/dist
echo "xin-tan.com" > CNAME

git init
git add -A
git commit -m 'deploy'

# xxoo521.com
# git push -f "https://godbmw:$CODING_TOKEN@git.dev.tencent.com/godbmw/godbmw.coding.me.git" master:master

git push -f "https://godbmw:$GITHUB_TOKEN@github.com/dongyuanxin/blog.git" master:gh-pages

cd -

rm -rf .vuepress/dist
